{"uri":"/channels/2981","name":"Everything Animated","description":"A channel for admirers of animation.  Just sit back, relax and enjoy the greatest animation talent out there carefully handpicked for you!

For all submissions: submit@everythinganimated.tv
Don't be shy!  I'll try and add as many great films as possible and the one's that don't make it will go into "Animation" group.
